subtitle: LIVE TRACKING & RESULTS
tagline: SHARE YOUR RACE OR TRAINING WITH YOUR FRIENDS & FAMILY

Event.title: Event Name
Event.description: You can start your live tracking from 1 hour before your start. Be sure to keep this app open all the time and do not close it!

status.gpsActive: GPS Active - Waiting for race to start

tracking.manualStartEnabled: Manual start mode enabled. You can start sending data anytime.
tracking.waitingForRace: GPS activated. Data will be sent when race starts.
tracking.waitingForRaceNoTime: GPS activated. Waiting for race information.

alerts.overrideMessage: Start sending location data immediately, bypassing the race start time?

errors.missingInfoDescription: Participant or event information not available
errors.permissionDescription: Location permission is required to track your progress
errors.gpsErrorDescription: Unable to get your location. Please check your GPS settings.
